attributes.name: ngCspNonce
attributes.description: Use the ngCspNonce attribute on the root application element as `<app ngCspNonce="randomNonceGoesHere"></app>`. The attribute should be used if you have access to server-side templating that can add the nonce both to the header and the index.html when constructing the response.

attributes.name: ngSkipHydration
attributes.description: You can add the `ngSkipHydration` attribute to a component's tag in order to skip hydrating the entire component. This is useful for component, which may not work properly with hydration enabled due to issues, like [Direct DOM Manipulation](https://angular.dev/guide/hydration#direct-dom-manipulation).
